root.name: 1701 A.D.: The Curse of the Dragon
root.description: 1701 A.D.: The Curse of the Dragon added many features and missions to the orignal game, including a map editor. The following profiles were added to the game: HoratioGrace BonnetDiego del TorroFinn Hallgvist
